name: Graveyard Inc.
description:
Welcome to the most exciting Graveyard Inc tycoon game! Upgrade and control your Graveyard Empire

Features:
Casual and easy gameplay
Various facilities upgrades and income boosters
Amazing animations and 3D graphics
Build new boads
Make important managing decisions to expand your business
Earn Money even offline.
No internet connection needed
If you like idle and tapping games, you will enjoy this managing game.

Idle Graveyard is easy-to-play game where you run your own business.
Build your Graveyard empire and manage all the ceremonies
